name: beta-datastax-ops
preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is maintained by DataStax and available to mutual DataStax and Mesosphere customers (eval and production) and prospects (eval) .

Functionality supported in Opscenter includes Repair, Monitoring, Backup & Restore, as well as some basic admin tools including cleanup, restart, and drain. No other OpsCenter functionality is tested or supported within the DC/OS Integration. Please make any feature requests to techpartner@datastax.com

Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 2.5 CPU | 4100 MB MEM | 10240 MB Disk

Contact Mesosphere and DataStax before deploying this service to ensure proper support channels are made available. Contact your rep at either company or techpartner@datastax.com. By using this service you agree to the license terms here: https://gist.github.com/012345/d1df9d43a0dfaa49e628c7bfbc9ffb52

Versions: DataStax Enterprise 5.1.2 (Standard and Max) & OpsCenter 6.1.2
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.datastax.com
	Issues: https://www.datastax.com/contactus
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Datastax Enterprise OpsCenter is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/dse/v2.0.0-5.1.2/uninstall/ to remove any persistent state if required.
